ai-snp3.1:1.3_0: and inquiring it is according to what is said.
ai-snp3.1:2.2_0: This sense-sphere is the field of dust.
ai-snp3.1:2.3_0: like a go forth in the open.
ai-snp3.1:2.4_0: Having seen (that), he went forth in the presence of the Elder Mahādhammarakkhita.
ai-snp3.1:3.1_0: After going forth in the body,
ai-snp3.1:7.2_0: I’m not born in a low family.
ai-snp3.1:8.2_0: were following close behind me by stalk,
ai-snp3.1:9.2_0: my sense-doors are guarded and well restrained;
ai-snp3.1:9.4_0: whether by day or by night.
ai-snp3.1:10.2_0: the sages have left the city.
ai-snp3.1:10.4_0: And there will be an instrument,
ai-snp3.1:11.1_0: in the vicinity of the Buddha, or in the future,
ai-snp3.1:11.2_0: Three grounds to those who wished.
ai-snp3.1:12.1_0: “That monk, great king, is a monk,
ai-snp3.1:12.2_0: alighting in front of a poison.
ai-snp3.1:12.3_0: while sitting in the sacred flame.
ai-snp3.1:12.4_0: like a lion in a mountain cave.”
ai-snp3.1:13.1_0: Having heard the seeds that are longing for two reasons,
ai-snp3.1:13.3_0: which has the form of peace.
ai-snp3.1:15.1_0: When the king was seated, the king exchanged greetings with him.
ai-snp3.1:15.3_0: When the greetings and polite conversation were over,
ai-snp3.1:17.3_0: I enjoy riches from the wealth!
ai-snp3.1:17.4_0: Questioning about birth and old age.”
ai-snp3.1:18.3_0: endowed with wealth, accomplished in wisdom,
ai-snp3.1:18.4_0: if it is to be relinquished;
ai-snp3.1:19.3_0: I’ve gone forth from that family,
ai-snp3.1:20.1_0: Seeing the danger in sensual pleasures,
ai-snp3.1:20.3_0: I’ll go forth in the striving.
